plot: Maya, a useless high school girl who's passionate about acting, accidentally meets Tsukikage Chikusa, a famous but retired actress who's looking for her successor to play the main role in the legendary play "The Crimson Goddess".

lists.title: Investigar para subir capítulos si se puede

plot_en: Maya, a useless high school girl who's passionate about acting, accidentally meets Tsukikage Chikusa, a famous but retired actress who's looking for her successor to play the main role in the legendary play "The Crimson Goddess".
plot_es: Maya, a useless high school girl who's passionate about acting, accidentally meets Tsukikage Chikusa, a famous but retired actress who's looking for her successor to play the main role in the legendary play "The Crimson Goddess".
title: Garasu no kamen
